Narrative: I am here to tell you, that NO, this is NOT FAIR. Animals deserve the basic right to live in their natural environment, and to be treated fairly. It is perfectly fine for animals to be used as meat, however there is no reason why they shouldn’t live a happy and natural life. Animals can feel pain. Animals can think. Therefore there’s absolutely NO reason why animals need to be cruelly and unethically treated, as seen through the distressing ways they’re treated when factory farmed. Animal rights is critical in our society today, and YOU have the power to make a difference.
Title: Animal Cruelty
sport_event: ['Africa Cup of Nations', 'Australian Open', 'Winter X Games 26']
